dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice
Class PushService

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.pushservice.PushService

public class PushService
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all registered push operations. It reads all push operations registered via extension point, but push operations can also be registered manually.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b

callSync

public void callSync(AbstractPushEvent event,
                     boolean logErrors)
Synchronous call of a push event. All push operations which can handle the given event are invoked.

Parameters:
event - The push event
logErrors - true if the errors shall be logged to the Error Log
Since:
2008.b

callSync

public void callSync(AbstractPushEvent event,
                     java.util.List<AbstractPushOperation> operations,
                     boolean logErrors)
Synchronous call of a push event for only a restricted number of push operations.

Parameters:
event - The push event
operations - List of push operations which shall be called
logErrors - true if the errors shall be logged to the Error Log
Since:
2008.b
